THE PROBLEM:
500ms debounce auto-save was too unreliable:
- Users navigating away before debounce fires
- No clear feedback when saving
- No way to force immediate save

THE SOLUTION:
Removed debounce entirely and added manual Save buttons to:
- CheckboxesEditor
- MultipleChoiceEditor  
- DropdownEditor

Features:
- Clear "Unsaved changes" indicator
- "Saving..." feedback during save
- Button disabled until changes made
- Button disabled while saving
- Immediate save when clicked

This gives users full control over when options are saved
and provides clear visual feedback throughout the process.
